content: The attacker exploits a vulnerability in Firefox by browsing www.nhra.com, connecting the victim host to C&C servers (189.141.204.211 and 208.203.20.42). The attacker then uses /run/shm to escalate privileges and gain access to a list of processes. The attacker finds the sshd process and injects malicious code into the process. The compromised sshd process writes to a file /var/log/sshdlog on the hostâ€™s filesystem.
